works.description: The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "With a fun name, an even more playful style, and a story you want to share, Punjammies makes a noteworthy social enterprise."

The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "During this speech, religious historian Karen Armstrong discusses religion and modernity, namely the role compassion occupies in society today."

The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "While “buy one, give one” tees are more popular than ever, the Naked Hippie offers something that strikes a different chord."

The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "We have seen a variety of social businesses spring up in developing nations that hire locals to create products in order to provide ethical income opportunities."
